challenge.title: Define an Action Creator
challenge.description: After creating an action, the next step is sending the action to the Redux store so it can update its state. In Redux, you define action creators to accomplish this. An action creator is simply a JavaScript function that returns an action. In other words, action creators create objects that represent action events.
challenge.instructions: Define a function named actionCreator() that returns the action object when called.

tests.text: Running the actionCreator function should return the action object.
The returned action should have a key property type with value LOGIN.

challengeFiles.name: script
script
